rules_text:
Search your library for a basic land or Nexus card, reveal it, put it in your hand, then shuffle.
Innervate 3–{3}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{G}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target noncreature permanent you control. It becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
